name: Spin Pin AA
description:
Spin Pin AA is a simple game, you just need one touch to control and play, tap on screen to shoot the PIN at the circle in the center. Avoid collisions with other PINs in the circle, just aim and shoot at vacant areas of the circle. With each level/screen the game gets harder and harder.

*** You will be winner with conditions:
All pin put in the circle.
Not any pin impinge or collide together.
- ... Not any more, the rules are so easy, right? Not easy as you may think.

It is easy to play but will make you crazy as you proceed on harder levels.
Try it now!
